location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Secretary in the Secret, Political and Foreign Department, Fort William, Calcutta

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage which has almost entirely obscured the signature of the letter. However, comparisons with other signatures and the context allows the author to be confidently identified.

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of a communication dated 31 July 1807 that announced that Lord Minto had taken charge of the office of Governor-General of Bengal.
